com.microsoft.azure.management.sql

Class ServerUpgradeOperationsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.management.sql.ServerUpgradeOperationsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerUpgradeOperations, ServiceOperations<SqlManagementClientImpl>

    public class ServerUpgradeOperationsImpl
extends Object
implements ServiceOperations<SqlManagementClientImpl>, ServerUpgradeOperations
    Represents all the operations for Azure SQL Database Server Upgrade
